name: Estatik Mortgage Calculator
author: Estatik

sections.description:
Estatik Mortgage Calculator will allow your website visitors to estimate their mortgage payments. It is great-looking and informative, and absolutely free! Check out http://estatik.net/ for more information.
Visit demo of Estatik calculator on one of default WordPress themes or demo on Estatik custom theme.

Main features:

  • Estatik mortgage calculator looks good on any device from both sides: admin and front.
  • You can use it as simple calculator with Purchase price, Down payment, Interest Rate or enable advanced options and switch on extra Home Insurance, Property taxes and PMI.
  • Adapt calculator color according to your theme styles. Choose any color you need via plugin Settings.
  • The calculator displays results in Popup window with graph or simple text and image. You can select one of options most appealing for you.
  • Add calculator to your sidebars as widget or use shortcode to add it to any page.
  • To make it more attractive we used jQuery and Google Charts in its code.
  • If used with Estatik plugin, Purchase Price field in Calculator is synchronized with Listing price in Estatik if used together on the same page.

Translated into:
* Russian
* Spanish
* German
* Italian
* Dutch

Visit official Estatik Mortgage Calculator page to get full information.
sections.installation:
1. Upload files of Estatik Calculator plugin to the /wp-content/plugins/
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Go to widgets and add Estatik Mortgage Calculator Widget to selected Sidebar OR use shortcode [es_mortgage_calculator layout=”horizontal/vertical”] to add calculator to the page
  4. Go to Settings and find Estatik Mortgage Calculator there to configure it
sections.faq:
Does Estatik Calculator work with any WordPress theme?

Yes, it does. Beside Estatik themes, you can use it with any WordPress theme.

Do I need to install Estatik Simple or Pro together with Calculator?

No, Estatik Mortgage Calculator works separately and doesn’t require to download Estatik real estate plugin.

Do I get free support for this free plugin?

Yes, we can provide support via email and chat if needed.
sections.changelog:
2.0.10 (May, 07, 2023)

  • security issues fixed

2.0.7 (November, 25, 2021)

  • small fixes

2.0.6 (November, 9, 2021)

  • Plugin settings link added
  • FIX: currency saving in Mortgage settings fixed
  • icons issue fixed

2.0.5 (November, 24, 2020)

  • FIX: Graph&Text animation issue fixed
  • FIX: Text alignment issue fixed
  • NEW: WordPress latest support added
  • minor fixes

2.0.4 (June, 10, 2020)

  • NEW: Added new translations
  • FIX: Interest rates step in Display Settings fixed
  • FIX: Adaptability of the calculator in the sidebar of various extensions fixed
  • FIX: Currency in calculator widget is fixed in the frontpage

2.0.3 (April, 9, 2020)

  • Language files edited
  • Responsive layouts issue fixed
  • Step fields added to Config settings

2.0.1 (November, 6, 2019)

  • Safari responsive layout bugs fixed
  • Formula glitches fixed

2.0 (August 23, 2019)

  • Major release
  • New styles settings added
    More details at www.estatik.net

1.4 (January 13, 2018)

  • Estatik plugin integration added – Purchase price field is synchronized with Listing price if used together on the same page.

1.3.1 (December 25, 2017)

  • removed normalize.css file

1.2.3 (August 11, 2017)

  • Translation support fixed
  • Interest rate decimals increased to 3 digits

1.2.2 (May 17, 2017)

  • Language files added: de_DE, es_ES, it_IT, nl_NL, ru_RU

1.2.1 (May 4, 2017)

  • Settings moved from a separate table into wordpress standard options
  • Shortcode work fixed
  • Frontend fields styles fixed
  • Added “Settings” link in Plugins

1.2.0 (March 17, 2017)

  • Shortcode [es_mortgage_calculator layout=”horizontal/vertical”]
  • Bug with popup window in responive layouts fixed
  • Show/hide option in Widget Settings added

1.1.0 (February 3, 2017)

  • Principal & Interest calculations fixed

1.0 (January 16, 2017)

  • Calculations with Purchase price, Down payment, Interest Rate, Home Insurance, Property taxes and PMI
  • Responsive
  • Unlimited colors
  • 2 options of results popup window
